name: Trail of Ten Falls
description: The Trail of Ten Falls is a 7.4 mile heavily trafficked loop trail located near Mehama, Oregon that features a waterfall and is rated as moderate. The trail is primarily used for hiking.

name: Angel's Rest
description: Angel's Rest is a 4.5 mile heavily trafficked out and back trail located near Corbett, Oregon that features a waterfall and is rated as moderate.

name: Latourell Falls Loop Trail
description: Latourell Falls Loop Trail is a 2.1 mile heavily trafficked loop trail located near Corbett, Oregon that features a waterfall and is rated as moderate.

name: Misery Ridge and River Trail
description: Misery Ridge and River Trail is a 3.5 mile heavily trafficked loop trail located near Terrebonne, Oregon that features a river and is rated as difficult.
